title: Needle Case, 1815–35
medium:
Medium: leather, paper, silk, wool
Technique: stamped and painted
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Covers of stamped brown leather lined with green paper. Leaves are painted taffeta lined with wool, and show military scenes with uniforms of about 1815 - 1835.

tombstone.epitaph:
Needle Case, 1815–35.
1815–35. Medium: leather, paper, silk, wool
Technique: stamped and painted. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-48.
